review: This is a pretty cool lil' device. Install and registration was a breeze. I downloaded the FireTV iOS App (allows for voice search and a keyboard) in favor of the included remote, and am quite impressed with this package. The Fire TV Stick is a must have for those looking to stream Amazon Prime Videos, as with augmenting their home (iOS-driven) entertainment system. Will be handing these out during the holiday season.
